mapper.insert: insert into band(createMaster, bandName, category, memberCnt) values(#{createMaster}, #{bandName}, #{category}, #{memberCnt});
mapper.select: select b.no as bandNo, b.bandName as bandName, r.idx, r.memberId, m.nickname as memberNickname, r.joinStatus, r.joinAt from bandJoinRequest r inner join band b on r.bandNo = b.no inner join member m on r.memberId = m.id where r.bandNo = #{bandNo} and r.joinStatus = 'pending' oder by r.joinAt asc;
mapper.update: update band set memberCnt = memberCnt + 1 where no = #{bandNo}
